About.title: Yo'ldosh: A new era of intercity travel in Uzbekistan
About.intro: In 2026, a service will appear on the Uzbekistan market that will change the approach to intercity trips. Yo'ldosh is not just an app for finding ride companions â€” itâ€™s a solution to a problem faced daily by thousands of Uzbekistanis.

problem.title: The problem we solve
problem.content: If youâ€™ve ever looked for a ride from Tashkent to Samarkand, Bukhara, or any other city in Uzbekistan, you know how it works: endless Telegram groups, posting your phone number, a flood of calls from dozens of drivers, long price and condition negotiations. This process wastes time, nerves, and doesnâ€™t guarantee youâ€™ll find exactly what you need.
problem.solution: Thatâ€™s why we created Yo'ldosh â€” a centralized platform where drivers and passengers find each other quickly, conveniently, and safely, without revealing personal contacts or endless negotiations.

howItWorks.title: How Yo'ldosh works
howItWorks.intro: We made the process as simple and clear as possible. All you need to get started is to register with your phone number. After that, you get access to the platformâ€™s main features.

passengers.title: For passengers:
passengers.content: Specify the main parameters of your trip: where youâ€™re going from and to, departure date, and number of passengers. The app instantly shows a list of available rides from drivers going your route. You can choose a car, review the conditions, check the price, and book a seat â€” all without a single call. A special feature of our service is the ability to plan trips in advance.

drivers.title: For drivers:
drivers.registration: To start carrying passengers through Yo'ldosh, you need to go through a simple registration. Any citizen of Uzbekistan over 18 with a personal car can become a driver. During registration, youâ€™ll need to upload photos of your driverâ€™s license and vehicle technical passport.
drivers.benefits: The main advantage for drivers â€” no more wasting time searching for passengers and endless calls. You publish a trip with your price, and passengers find you themselves. You set the price, not the passengers.

guarantee.title: Trip guarantee: 100% prepayment system
guarantee.content: One of Yo'ldoshâ€™s key features is full prepayment. We understand how critical it is for drivers to be confident: if a passenger books a seat, they will definitely go.
guarantee.benefit: Thanks to prepayment, we act as a guarantor that the trip will happen. By booking a seat, the passenger confirms their serious intention, and the driver gains confidence in tomorrow.

payment.title: Convenient payment methods
payment.methods: Yo'ldosh supports both card payments and cash.
payment.cash: However, cash handling is organized in a special way: money is not transferred directly to the driver. Instead, users can top up the appâ€™s internal wallet through our partnersâ€™ terminals â€” Paynet and Oson.

loyalty.title: Loyalty program
loyalty.content: We value our users and plan to launch a loyalty program. For inviting new drivers or passengers, you will receive bonus points to your in-app wallet.
loyalty.campaigns: Special campaigns with additional rewards will also be regularly held for drivers â€” stay updated in the app.

geography.title: Geography and availability
geography.content: Yo'ldosh launches across all of Uzbekistan at once. Whether youâ€™re traveling from Tashkent to Fergana, Nukus to Samarkand, or Andijan to Navoi â€” our service will help you find companions on any route.
geography.apps: The app will be available for both iOS and Android users, ensuring maximum audience coverage.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: We are creating an environment where drivers and passengers can find like-minded travel companions with minimal time and money costs. Every day, thousands of people in Uzbekistan travel between cities â€” to work, to relatives, on business.
mission.guarantees: The guarantees we provide are important to us. Yo'ldosh is not just an intermediary â€” itâ€™s a platform that takes responsibility for every trip being predictable, safe, and convenient.

future.title: Future plans
future.content: Yo'ldosh is just beginning its journey, but weâ€™re already looking ahead. Plans include integration of additional services, such as parcel delivery through our platform. We are constantly improving functionality and listening to user feedback.

notTaxi.title: Yo'ldosh is not a taxi â€” itâ€™s ridesharing
notTaxi.content: Itâ€™s important to understand the difference: we are not an instant taxi service. Yo'ldosh is a platform for planning intercity trips where drivers and passengers team up for shared journeys. Itâ€™s a new travel culture based on mutual trust, convenience, and reasonable savings.

About.conclusion: Welcome to the new era of intercity travel. Welcome to Yo'ldosh.

Help.Title: Help us protect you from fraudsters
Help.Subtitle: At Yo'ldosh, we do everything to ensure your trips are safe. But sometimes scammers try to take advantage of users' trust.

Protect.Title: To protect yourself:
Protect.1: Communicate and pay for trips only through the Yo'ldosh app.
Protect.2: Do not share SMS codes, PINs, or bank card information with anyone.
Protect.3: Check driver and passenger ratings and reviews.
Protect.4: If you notice anything suspicious, report it to us and we will deal with it immediately.

Help.BeCareful: Be careful, and every trip with Yo'ldosh will be calm and reliable.

WhyUs.Title: Why Choose Us
WhyUs.Subtitle: Your reliable companion for long-distance ride sharing across Uzbekistan.

Cards.description1: We verify every driver and passenger to make your trip safe and worry-free.
Cards.description2: Find a trip and book your seat in seconds. No long waiting times.
Cards.description3: No hidden fees â€” you always know exactly what you pay for.
Cards.description4: Choose rides that fit your preferences and travel comfortably.
Cards.description5: Join a friendly community of drivers and passengers who share your route.
Cards.description6: Our support team is always here to help, any time, any day.
Cards.description7: Plan trips on your schedule â€” book, change or cancel with ease.
Cards.description8: Reduce your carbon footprint by sharing rides instead of driving alone.

Travel.Title: Travel more conveniently with the Yo'ldosh app

Travel.Subtitle: With the Yo'ldosh app, your trip history is always at hand!
